quoteText: When enabled, we may also use your device’s camera (e.g. Apple’s TrueDepth camera) so you can use services such as product visualization (e.g., scan room to see item in your space) or virtual fitting (e.g., scan facial data to try on accessories/beauty products). Information collected from the TrueDepth camera is used in real time - we do not store this information on our servers or share it with third parties.
title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

tosdr.case: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
